instructions: Open the Samsung Pay app and tap the three dots in the upper right corner. Tap Settings in the menu that appears and then select Use Finger sensor gestures on the next screen. Make sure the Finger Sensor Gestures option is toggled on, and then toggle on Open Samsung Pay . When you re finished, tap the Home button, then the next time you want to use your mobile wallet to complete a transaction and your phone is locked, hold your finger on the fingerprint sensor to open the phone and then swipe your finger up the fingerprint sensor to open Samsung Pay.
